name: lia
description: Sprite tool, bases on sprcify pictures, builds both sprite images and stylesheet files

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel-node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --dir test/coverage --root src --include-all-sources true -x sprite_conf.js -- --compilers js:babel-core/register -i test/*.test.js
scripts.dev: rm -rf lib && node node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel src -d lib -D -w

author: liyh <cupools@gmail.com>
